document_data.name: Arendermore
document_data.mainbody: '''Arendermore''' was the wealthiest ward in [[Tarmalune]], named for legendary [[gnome]] builder [[Arender]]. It was located to the southwest of the city.{{Cite dragon/376/Tarmalune and the Windrise Ports|46}}
document_data.Geography: The ward consisted of the manors of the wealthiest people of Tarmalune, most of them designed by Arender. The inhabitants of Arendermore hired professional guards to protect their property.
document_data.Inhabitants: The inhabitants of Arendermore were mostly the oldest families of Tarmalune.
